content: पूर्ववत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Having something antecedent or a cause. {@--2@} Relating to something preceding. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} One of the three kinds of अनुमान, inference of the effect from the cause; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} inferring from the rising of clouds that rain will fall. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} As before.
